title: "RRK Summary Area for Herb Shrub Tree"
output: html_document
---

# Overview
Calculate percentage of area by Herb, Shrub, Tree from GEE outputs


# Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Data
```{r}
cc = read.csv("../data/ccRrkHST.csv")
nc = read.csv("../data/ncRrkHST.csv")
sc = read.csv("../data/scRrkHST.csv")
sn = read.csv("../data/snRrkHST.csv")
```

```{r}
( df = bind_rows(cc, nc, sc, sn) )
```

```{r}
( dfPrct = df %>% 
  mutate(herbPrct = (herbsumsqkm/vegsumsqkm)*100) %>%
  mutate(shrubPrct = (shrubsumsqkm/vegsumsqkm)*100) %>%
  mutate(treePrct = (treesumsqkm/vegsumsqkm)*100)
)

```

```{r}
write.csv(dfPrct, "../outputs/SumPercentHST.csv")
```
